scripts.migration:run: dotenv -- npm run typeorm migration:run -- -d src/infra/scripts/typeorm-data-source.js
scripts.services:up: docker-compose -f src/infra/docker-compose.development.yml up -d || docker compose -f src/infra/docker-compose.development.yml up -d
scripts.services:stop: docker-compose -f src/infra/docker-compose.development.yml stop || docker compose -f src/infra/docker-compose.development.yml stop
